Summary I am an experienced Account Manager and Channel Development executive with a demonstrated track record of achievements and high degree of drive and determination. A business development executive who understands company's corporate views, support and defend them. Channel proponent with customer centric attitude and dedication to being a trusted advisor. I have a passion for helping organizations solve their problems through latest technologies. I have the proven ability to gain customer commitments, build momentum and accelerate the sales cycle. I posses great teaming skills and demonstrated ability to understand sales barriers and how to overcome initial technology hurdles to close business. 
 
My clients include Fortune 1000 and mid-sized companies in various industries including manufacturing, healthcare, transportation and logistics.
